thread.title: Kangana Ranaut attacks Hrithik Roshan again; labels her leaked emails as ‘hideous’ and ‘CRAP’
thread.title_full: Kangana Ranaut attacks Hrithik Roshan again; labels her leaked emails as ‘hideous’ and ‘CRAP’

author: Pooja Nayak
title: Kangana Ranaut attacks Hrithik Roshan again; labels her leaked emails as ‘hideous’ and ‘CRAP’
text:
Kangana Ranaut, Anushka Sharma, Tamannah Bhatia: WORST dressed celebrities of the week 
Guess it’s the return of Kangana Ranaut and Hrithik Roshan ‘s infamous legal battle. Remember those leaked emails which had exposed Kangana and Hrithik’s cheesy conversations? Although Hrithik soon rubbished the emails stating it was not him but his imposter. Talking to Mid-day newspaper, Kangana Ranaut, now, has talked about the infamous incident and those leaked emails. She says, “I was dragged to court for being who I am. I was restricted to a relationship that was [carried out] behind closed doors and I fought it fair and square. People [can] talk rubbish, but they can’t decide how I lead my life. I felt stigmatised. I would wake up to [media reports] of hideous mails, which I hadn’t written. I am a certified screenwriter from the New York Film Academy. I don’t write such crap (laughs).” 
She adds, “Someone I once shared a beautiful equation with did it… and with such malice. It hurt me”. She speaks of receiving a legal notice, demanding an apology for the claims she made in public. “I refused. I never completely understood the story — who was impersonating whom? I was threatened that horrifying secrets about me would be revealed. My parents were concerned for my safety, but I couldn’t bear it quietly. There was a group of jealous hats wandering around him (Hrithik), using him to aim vengeance at me.” Also read: Has Kangana Ranaut really AGREED to appear on Koffee With Karan with Saif Ali Khan? 
Well Kangana Ranaut never minces her words and she has proved it once again. On the work, after a no show in 2016, she’ll next be seen in February 24 release, Vishal Bhardwaj’s Rangoon. The film also stars Saif Ali Khan and Shahid Kapoor in the lead and is said to be a love triangle based during World War II. The trailer of the films have already created excitement the among fans and Kangana will be seen playing the character of Julia, a tribute of sorts to Fearless Nadia.
